scripts.test: eslint js/id && eslint js/hoot && phantomjs node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js test/index.html dot
scripts.cover: mkdir -p istanbul && cp test/index.html test/istanbul_index.html && replace --silent 'js/hoot' 'istanbul/hoot' test/istanbul_index.html && replace --silent 'js/id' 'istanbul/id' test/istanbul_index.html && istanbul instrument --output istanbul/hoot js/hoot && istanbul instrument --output istanbul/id js/id && phantomjs node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js test/istanbul_index.html dot '{"hooks": "mocha-phantomjs-istanbul", "coverageFile": "mocha-coverage/coverage.json"}' && istanbul report --root mocha-coverage --dir mocha-coverage lcov
